Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System for use with the antimicrobial agent Cefuroxime - 1-64 µg/mL - Gram-negative ID/AST or AST only Phoenix panels
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility System
Specimen Type(s): Pure culture isolates of Gram-negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System with Cefuroxime for automated antimicrobial susceptibility testing of bacterial isolates
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by MIC of most Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacterial isolates from pure culture, including Enterobacteriaceae, Non-Enterobacteriaceae, Staphylococcus, Enterococcus, and Streptococcus, with expanded organism groups and removal of Klebsiella pneumoniae limitation
